channel.title: KenSmith tweets
channel.description: A feed of recent tweets from KenSmith.

item.description: Or possibly Cameron is the name of the robot. https://t.co/vc21I5PMoh

You know you're looking at a Republican elected official on Twitter from the one stock "I'm horrified" tweet on the day of the mass shooting and the silence on the subject every day that follows. https://t.co/hBh08zFePO

Walorski's silence is classic. You can reliably spot a Republican elected official on Twitter by the one stock "I'm horrified" tweet on the day of the mass shooting and the silence on the subject every day that follows. https://t.co/o2yBaU4y3w

How can you spot a Republican elected official on Twitter? By the one stock "I'm horrified" tweet on the day of the mass shooting and the silence on the subject every day that follows. https://t.co/0VOoL9i5Ei

In the final paragraphs, @TimDunlop raises the challenge of progressive media building together on their strengths. (With what tools, attitudes, affiliations . . . ? Interesting.) Relearning democracy, by @timdunlop https://t.co/Vy0tdByGSf
